answers.answer: I am on the same boat, after i took medicine for 10 days for UTI, my symptom still persistence. I still need go to bathroom very frequently. My doc. is on vacation until July/7. Dont know what to do, but worry is not going to help. Calm down, drink more water and get good rest. U r going to see doc. on Friday. It is tomorrow, why worry too much. UTI is not a big deal.
Im not sure if is a UTI they just called me in medcine...All Im doing is peeing every hour no pain.........Is that signs of UTI...
Im not sure if is a UTI they just called me in medcine...All Im doing is peeing every hour no pain.........Is that signs of UTI...

You have to do a unrine test to know that . Nobody can predict it without test. but worry doesn't help too much. You are going to see a doc. tomorrow. So stop worrying.  You took pill without  unrine test, therefore, the pill may not target the bacteria which you have.
Don't worry about diabeties, since the blood test will show you have that problem. u had blood test before and come back normal. then u shouldn't worry about that .
Im afraid to diabeties but they say more signs..........

bip, you are ok!!! The probable reason for you peeing so much is because you are nervous over it. If I think about it, I could make myself go right now:-) But if this still bothers you give yourself another day, and then call the doc. Try and relax and keep your mind off of it.  (Wait, that sounds familiar...have we said that before on here?hahaha!!) Best of luck to you!!!
Ya I had a test last year.Can you develop diabeties in a year........
You are ok. From what you said you really don't have risk factors for diabetes...that I know of and you just got tested last year. I'm sure you are fine and it is the stress.

Any major medical causes of frequent urination do NOT discriminate based on the time of day.  In other words, if you had diabetes you would need to pee frequently thoughout the day AND throughout the night!  For this reason, I personally dont feel you have a UTI (you arent getting up every hour to pee), and the likely reason for your symptom is stress-related; this would explain why you only experience this during the day when you are awake.  Your doctor will be able to confirm a diagnosis (or lack thereof) tomorrow - hang in there.  What time is your appointment?

question: I started my antobic 48 hours ago and Im still urniating every hour....What should I do? should I still worry about it?
title: Im still concern.....
